title: Sunshine Kids

## Project Specification

* Class: Advance Typography
* Design Tool: Figma

* Source Code: [View on Github](https://github.com/JaimeGG64/sunshine-kids)

## Problem

Generally non-profits does not have the resources to develop a polish landing page. Sunshine kids is one example. The goals of this redesign to make the home page inviting but informative as well.
